Flub.Name: Iterations
Flub.Description: Number of iterations of the convection process.

Flub.Name: Steepness
Flub.Description: How much steepness to eradicate. Low values create sharper drops. High values create smooth flows.

Flub.Name: Strength
Flub.Description: Strength of convection where sediments are bound together.

Flub.Name: Cutoff
Flub.Description: Altitude at which the effect is cut off.
